actions.name: Charm
actions.description: Humanoid within 30 ft. makes DC 15 WIS save or charmed for 1 day, obeying commands; repeats save if harmed or given suicidal command. Immune to this charm for 24 hours after save success or effect ends; only one target charmed at a time.

actions.name: Draining Kiss
actions.description: Kisses a charmed or willing creature; DC 15 CON save or take 32 (5d10+5) psychic (half on success) and HP max reduced by amount until long rest; target dies if max HP reaches 0.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.description: Magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.
